reviews.text: i visited Alton as I had a temp job nearby. It was early morning and some individuals were handing out mince pie as Christmas was nearing.  The station is well staffed for the needs of passengers.
Great station with a cafe outside and easy transport links to London.

Nice quiet small station with parking opposite. Staff friendly & helpful. May be slightly slower into London than the alternative for me, but is the better option as quieter plus as it's end of line you always have a seat on the way up.

An OK station with a ticket office, bicycle storage, a nice new footbridge near the end of the platforms with lifts, a few ticket machines at the front of the station as well as interchange with buses towards Farnham, Guildford and Winchester. Also serves the Watercress Line which stops adjacent the mainline platforms.

P. K. H. ALTON "RAILWAY" STATION. 
P. K. H. STEAM RAILWAY TRAIN'S.
